channel.title: Homemaker Chic
channel.itunes:author: Angela Reed & Shaye Elliott
channel.description: Rescuing the art of homemaking from the daily grind with red lips (and no jumpers).

item.itunes:title: TCB… A Darn Fun Conversation
item.title: TCB… A Darn Fun Conversation
item.description: Listener discretion is advised. From real listening to French irons. From cows to extra body parts.  We haven’t talked as friends in over a week and it’s time to catch up!
item.content:encoded: Listener discretion is advised. From real listening to French irons. From cows to extra body parts.  We haven’t talked as friends in over a week and it’s time to catch up!
item.itunes:author: Angela Reed & Shaye Elliott

item.itunes:title: Taking Care of Business with Coach Paul
item.title: Taking Care of Business with Coach Paul
item.description:
Learn more about Coach Paul here: https://paulwright.fitness

Your support matters! How can you support the show!?
1. If you enjoy wine - drink Dry Farms https://www.dryfarmwines.com/homemakerchic
2. Do you love interior decorating - Join Ang's Old World Design Society oldworld.parisiennefarmgirl.com
3. Do you cook? - Cook better with Shaye cook.theelliotthomestead.com
4. Do you bathe and sleep? Use American Blossom towels  americanblossomlinens.com Coupon Code HOMEMAKERCHIC20
5. Do you wash your face? Wash it with Toups -N- Co. www.toupsandco.com Coupon Code: HOMEMAKERCHIC
6. Do you need to preserve your harvest? Invest in a freeze-dryer. https://bit.ly/harvestrighthomemaker
7. Do you simply LOVE the show? Become a Patron! www.Patreon.com/homemakerchicpodcast
8. Do you want a stylish home? Dress it in a rug from our SEASON 13 SPONSOR - House of Tocumen!  Beautiful rugs from Persia and Turkey... no "washable rugs" here made from plastics - these are washable and the REAL DEAL!  Use the coupon code Homemaker25 for a generous 25% off any full-size rug.  Thank you, HOUSE OF TOCUMEN, for sponsoring this season!

item.itunes:title: Ang is on FIRE & Shaye's Outta Here! - SEASON FINALE!
item.title: Ang is on FIRE & Shaye's Outta Here! - SEASON FINALE!
item.description:
Another FABULOUS Season IN. THE. BOOKS.  Our last round of questions today but warning... Angela has some serious joie de vivre and Shaye's making sure she's got her passport.  This is a big one!

Your support matters! How can you support the show!?
1. If you enjoy wine - drink Dry Farms https://www.dryfarmwines.com/homemakerchicclub
2. Do you love interior decorating - Join Ang's Old World Design Society oldworld.parisiennefarmgirl.com
3. Do you cook? - Cook better with Shaye cook.theelliotthomestead.com
4. Do you bathe and sleep? Use American Blossom towels  americanblossomlinens.com Coupon Code HOMEMAKERCHIC20
5. Do you wash your face? Wash it with Toups -N- Co. www.toupsandco.com Coupon Code: HOMEMAKERCHIC
6. Do you need to preserve your harvest? Invest in a freeze-dryer. https://bit.ly/harvestrighthomemaker
7. Do you simply LOVE the show? Become a Patron! www.Patreon.com/homemakerchicpodcast

SEE YOU NEXT SEASON!!!
9/19. Go back and listen to your old favs!  We'll miss you!

item.itunes:title: Unused Baby Names and Schedule Games - Questioning Your Summer!
item.title: Unused Baby Names and Schedule Games - Questioning Your Summer!
item.description:
Entertain in Style:
For clean, refreshing wines: https://www.dryfarmwines.com/homemakerchicclub Get two fun wine tumblers this summer! This is guilt-free wine, my friends. Paleo, Keto, and diet-friendly. You can get either 3, 6, or 12 bottles delivered to your door monthly.  https://www.dryfarmwines.com/homemakerchicclub

Ang's Music Playlist: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=n1ahH6BvI6o

SHOW SOME LOVE www.Patreon.com/homemakerchicpodcast
Homemaker Chic is made possible by our Patrons.  Enjoy video and BOOK EXCURPS!  THANK YOU, Patrons – we love you! 

THANKS TO OUR SHOW SPONSORS
www.toupsandco.com Coupon Code: HOMEMAKERCHIC  Toups and Co. is your one-stop online shop for all things natural and organic. Quality ingredients in makeup, skincare, and more to an entirely new level.  We LOVE www.toupsandco.com

Thank you to our official Season 11 Sponsor American Blossom Linens!  americanblossomlinens.com Coupon Code HOMEMAKERCHIC20 for 20% off - Enjoy GORGEOUS new organic sheets this summer!

BE PREPARED! Run your kitchen girlfriend with a Harvest Right Freeze Dryer!  Waste not, want not!
https://bit.ly/harvestrighthomemaker

NEED DESIGN INSPO AFTER TODAY'S SHOW?  Join THE OLD WORLD DESIGN SOCIETY
A unique combination of a magazine publication and a private online design group with private lessons taught by Angela! -DESIGN YOUR SPACE Visit oldworld.parisiennefarmgirl.com

The Elliott Homestead Cooking Community / cook.theelliotthomestead.com  Each month, I create five brand new, whole-food, price-conscious, from-scratch recipes each month and either ship them to you physically in the mail or deliver them to your inbox.

item.title: Making DOWN TIME Fun Again
item.description:
"You underestimate how motivated I am by beauty."  Free time?  Downtime? In between time?  We're chatting today about dropouts, to-do lists, screen time, creativity, and more. Join us?

For clean, refreshing wines: https://www.dryfarmwines.com/homemakerchic GET a bottle for a penny with your first order! Drink better, not more! This is guilt-free wine, my friends. item.itunes:title: NOW We're Making Fashion Fun Again
item.title: NOW We're Making Fashion Fun Again
item.description:
Whoops.  We got our Mean Mom threads crossed and TODAY is the Fashion episode. Yikes. We won't be riding any horses in* but we will be looking at fashions we would normally never consider (OK, to be fair, Shaye will be.  Angela will just be her old self she's been since she was 17).  But.. we're going to me fashion fun again, nonetheless.

(Ang here.  It's my job to write up these descriptions and holla to all my Chanel peeps who got the horse joke:)

Entertain in Style:
For clean, refreshing wines: https://www.dryfarmwines.com/homemakerchic GET a bottle for a penny with your first order! Drink better, not more! This is guilt-free wine, my friends. Paleo, Keto, and diet-friendly. You can get either 3, 6, or 12 bottles delivered to your door monthly.   https://www.dryfarmwines.com/homemakerchic

This is a company created by our friend Emily who has taken quality ingredients in makeup, skincare, and more to an entirely new level.  We LOVE www.toupsandco.com

item.itunes:title: Season 10 Premiere! Making it FUN Again!!!
item.title: Season 10 Premiere! Making it FUN Again!!!
item.description:
We've decided that we are going to dance across the finish line at the end of every day.  Tune in to hear what inspired this season's theme, what we're doing to have FUN and of course, more talk of body hair growing in the worst places...and then turning GREY!

Entertain in Style:
For clean, refreshing wines: https://www.dryfarmwines.com/homemakerchic GET a bottle for a penny with your first order! Drink better, not more! You can get either 3, 6, or 12 bottles delivered to your door monthly.   https://www.dryfarmwines.com/homemakerchic

SHOW SOME LOVE www.Patreon.com/homemakerchicpodcast
Homemaker Chic is made possible by our Patrons.  Enjoy video and BOOK EXCURPS!  THANK YOU, Patrons – we love you! 

THANKS TO OUR SHOW SPONSORS
Our Season 10 Sponsor is Toups & Co  www.toupsandco.com Coupon Code: CHIC10  Toups and Co. is your one-stop online shop for all things natural and organic. This is a company created by our friend Emily who has taken quality ingredients in makeup, skincare, and more to an entirely new level.  We LOVE www.toupsandco.com

Run your kitchen girlfriend with a Harvest Right Freeze Dryer!  Waste not, want not!
https://bit.ly/harvestrighthomemaker

NEED DESIGN INSPO AFTER TODAY'S SHOW?  Join THE OLD WORLD DESIGN SOCIETY
A unique combination of a magazine publication and a private online design group with private lessons taught by Angela! -DESIGN YOUR SPACE with Angela Visit oldworld.parisiennefarmgirl.com

The Elliott Homestead Cooking Community / cook.theelliotthomestead.com  Each month, I create five brand new, whole-food, price-conscious, from-scratch recipes each month and either ship them to you physically in the mail or deliver them to your inbox – whichever you prefer.

American Blossom Linens / americanblossomlinens.com / Coupon Code: HOMEMAKERCHIC20 Fall is here.  We are freshening up the home and tucking in into autumnal goodness! We are doing both of these things with our American Blossom Linens.  Invest ONCE, enjoy for a lifetime. HOMEMAKERCHIC20 for 20% off

House of Tocumen OUR FAVORITE rugs! www.hotrugs.net
Did you know, these beautiful, vintage handmade rugs are known to outlast their plastic counterparts by two decades!  Dress your home in one of these AMAZING RUGS and use the code HOMEMAKER25

item.title: CEO of the New Year
item.description:
Hopes, dreams, goals, resolutions... fun conversation today as we prep for New Year's Eve!

Join Angela's OLD WORLD DESIGN SOCIETY / oldworld.parisiennefarmgirl.com A unique combination of a magazine publication and a private online design group with private lessons taught by Angela! -The Old World Design Society is a place for individuals who cherish the elements of a bygone era. Visit oldworld.parisiennefarmgirl.com Grab the Harvest/Holiday edition and the Summer edition and unlock access to all the 2021 lessons!

SEASON SPONSOR - House of Tocumen OUR FAVORITE rugs! www.hotrugs.net

Did you know, these beautiful, vintage handmade rugs are known to outlast their plastic counterparts by two decades!  All of the House of Tocumen rugs are heirloom quality and made from the finest cotton and sheep's wools.

JOVIAL FOODS http://www.jovialfoods.com Jovial Foods is the top supplier of einkorn flours, einkorn pasta, Italian olive oils, prepackaged einkorn snacks, and the top-rated gluten-free pasta line.

SHOW SOME LOVE

Homemaker Chic is made possible by our Patrons. If you’d like to show some love to the podcast for just $10 a month and get video forms of all the episodes and much more, you can do that over on Patreon right here. item.itunes:title: CEO of Making Fabulous with Making Due
item.title: CEO of Making Fabulous with Making Due
item.description:
Sigh...everything is sparkly and enticing at this time of year and yet we know it's good form to exercise contentment in the face of it all.  Are new things bad?  Of course not.  Like everything we talk about on this show, it comes down to your heart.
Can you make fabulous and Homemaker Chic whilst making due?  We think so.  Join us for another fun hour among girlfriends.

Entertain in Style:
For clean, refreshing wines: https://www.dryfarmwines.com/homemakerchic 

Drink better, not more! This is guilt-free wine, my friends. Paleo, Keto, and diet-friendly. You must try Dry Farm Wines MUCH better wines. You can get either 3, 6, or 12 bottles delivered to your door monthly. Drink Dry Farm Wines with Ang and Shaye!  https://www.dryfarmwines.com/homemakerchic

item.itunes:title: Staying Feminine this Winter (Even in Flannel)
item.title: Staying Feminine this Winter (Even in Flannel)
item.description:
Happy Thanksgiving!  Today we're chatting before the big meal and we're hashing out ways we can stem chic and feminine even when we're bundled up for winter chills.  Is it even possible?  We think so.  Shaye's talking leg hair again and Ang is showing off her shoes she only brings out for the holidays!

Entertain in Style:
For clean, refreshing wines: https://www.dryfarmwines.com/homemakerchic Drink better, not more! This is guilt-free wine, my friends. Paleo, Keto, and diet-friendly. Each month, I create five brand new, whole-food, price-conscious, from-scratch recipes each month and either ship them to you physically in the mail or deliver them to your inbox – whichever you prefer.

Toups & Co  www.toupsandco.com Coupon Code: HOMEMAKER  Toups and Co. is your one-stop online shop for all things natural and organic. They do things differently! This is a company created by my friend Emily who has taken quality ingredients in makeup, skincare, and more to an entirely new level.

item.itunes:title: Season Finale! Going out with a Bang!
item.title: Season Finale! Going out with a Bang!
item.description:
Well, well, so we are more than just Homemakers?  Even though we are all different, we're made in God's image?  WHAT?  We have different personalities, dreams and opinions.... NUANCE?  No way!

noo͞′äns″, nyoo͞′-, noo͞-äns′, nyoo͞-

noun

  1. A subtle or slight degree of difference, as in meaning, feeling, or tone; a gradation.
  2. Expression or appreciation of subtle shades of meaning, feeling, or tone.
  3. Any one of the different gradations by which a color passes from its lightest to its darkest shade; a shade of difference or variation in a color.

Join us today as we wrap up a great season and take your advice and ditch the self-senscoring.  All of the sudden we hear Taylor Swift singing, "Don't say I didn't, say I didn't warn ya."

Sip wine, in chic fashion, in your cozy home!
For clean, refreshing wines: https://www.dryfarmwines.com/homemakerchic 

Drink better, not more! This is guilt-free wine, my friends. Paleo, Keto, and diet-friendly. You must try Dry Farm Wines MUCH better wines. You can get either 3, 6, or 12 bottles delivered to your door monthly. Drink Dry Farm Wines with Ang and Shaye!  https://www.dryfarmwines.com/homemakerchic

THANK YOU!  American Blossom linens for being the official SEASON 8 SPONSOR!
Invest once!  Enjoy forever!   The ONLY ORGANIC, ALL AMERICAN-made sheets on the market! American Blossom Linens / americanblossomlinens.com / Coupon Code: HOMEMAKERCHIC20

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS
Join Angela's OLD WORLD DESIGN SOCIETY / oldworld.parisiennefarmgirl.com A unique combination of a magazine publication and a private online design group with private lessons taught by Angela! -The Old World Design Society is a place for individuals who cherish the elements of a bygone era. Visit oldworld.parisiennefarmgirl.com Grab the Harvest/Holiday edition on sale and unlock access to all four summer design lessons!

We Wear Toups & Co  www.toupsandco.com Coupon Code: HOMEMAKER  Toups and Co. is your one-stop online shop for all things natural and organic. They do things differently! This is a company created by my friend Emily who has taken quality ingredients in makeup, skincare, and more to an entirely new level.

SHOW SOME LOVE - and watch us try to do our makeup!
Homemaker Chic is made possible by our Patrons. If you’d like to show some love to the podcast for just $10 a month and get video forms of all the episodes and much more, you can do that over on Patreon right here. https://www.patreon.com/homemakerchicpodcast THANK YOU, Patrons – we love you! If you’d like to submit topic requests, you can do that by emailing Shaye and Angela at info@homemakerchicpodcast.com

  • www.youtube.com/c/ParisienneFarmgirl/featured
  • Instagram @parisiennefarmgirl
  • Shaye
  • www.theelliotthomestead.com
  • www.youtube.com/c/Theelliotthomestead/featured

item.title: Let Us Entertain You
item.description:
Lots of you ask what entertains US.  So we're spilling the beans today, from guilty pleasures to true enrichment. After the counters are clean, the candle is lit and the jammies are on - let us entertain you as we share what entertains US.

Sip while you're entertained:
For clean, refreshing wines: https://www.dryfarmwines.com/homemakerchic 

Drink better, not more! This is guilt-free wine, my friends. Paleo, Keto, and diet-friendly. You must try Dry Farm Wines MUCH better wines. You can get either 3, 6, or 12 bottles delivered to your door monthly. Drink Dry Farm Wines with Ang and Shaye!  https://www.dryfarmwines.com/homemakerchic

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS
The Elliott Homestead Cooking Community / cook.theelliotthomestead.com This is for those home cooks out there who would love some new inspiration, ideas, and motivation in the kitchen. Each month, I create five brand new, whole-food, price-conscious, from-scratch recipes each month and either ship them to you physically in the mail or deliver them to your inbox – whichever you prefer.

American Blossom Linens / americanblossomlinens.com / Coupon Code: HOMEMAKERCHIC20 Fall is here.  We are freshening up the home and tucking in into autumnal goodness! We are doing both of these things with our American Blossom Linens.  Invest ONCE, enjoy for a lifetime.

Toups & Co  www.toupsandco.com Coupon Code: HOMEMAKER  Toups and Co. is your one-stop online shop for all things natural and organic. They do things differently! This is a company created by my friend Emily who has taken quality ingredients in makeup, skincare, and more to an entirely new level.

SHOW SOME LOVE
Homemaker Chic is made possible by our Patrons. If you’d like to show some love to the podcast for just $10 a month and get video forms of all the episodes and much more, you can do that over on Patreon right here. THANK YOU, Patrons – we love you! If you’d like to submit topic requests, you can do that by emailing Shaye and Angela at info@homemakerchicpodcast.com

item.itunes:title: Udder Management
item.title: Udder Management
item.description:
It's time for another farm chat and after this episode, you might shelve those romantic notions you have of farming and run for the hills!  Angela got pooped on by a chicken and Shaye's sick ram didn't make it.  We're mulling farm life and all it's ups and downs, but, in the end it's all worth it.

Sip wine, in chic fashion, in your cozy home!
For clean, refreshing wines: https://www.dryfarmwines.com/homemakerchic

item.title: You Asked - How We Stay HEALTHY!
item.description:
It's been a long year and a half and for many of us, our health is a bigger priority than ever before.  From the danger of extra pounds to the need for supplements and healthy food choices - today we are unpacking our personal health routines, health struggles, new choices, and talking about our health "wish list" too.

item.itunes:title: The 1. The ONLY. Miss. Mustard. Seed.
item.title: The 1. The ONLY. Miss. Mustard. Seed.
item.description:
Fangirl swooning up in here as we throw down with our new BFF Ms. Marian Parsons!  That's right, her paint is on your dresser and now her book needs to be on your shelves!
She's telling us the WHOLE scoop on what it takes to make you say, this, "FEELS LIKE HOME!"
And wait for it... fabric walls, homemakers.  FABRIC walls. 
All that homey goodness coming out today in our interview with Marian Parsons of Miss Mustard Seed fame and author of the new book, Feels Like Home.  Available for pre-order NOW!

Sip wine, in chic fashion, in your cozy home!
For clean, refreshing wines: https://www.dryfarmwines.com/homemakerchic

item.description:
It's official, Angela would NOT be a looker during the Medieval period and Shaye is convinced once you get a facelift, you need another one every 20 years.  From fake eyelashes to how much goop we smear on our faces at night, this is a fun one.

item.itunes:title: Declutter Like a Mother - We Interview Allie Casazza
item.title: Declutter Like a Mother - We Interview Allie Casazza
item.description:
Good morning sexy homemakers! We're talking toaster bread crumbs and plastic toys and everything in between today with author and speaker, Allie Casazza. Let's take a good look at if we own our stuff or if our stuff owns us as we commit to "make our beds" and improve this fine art of homemaking!

For clean, refreshing wines: https://www.dryfarmwines.com/homemakerchic 

Dry Farm Wines is wine supplier that sources organic, biodynamic, naturally yeasted, low-sugar, lower-alcohol wines from all over the world. Dry Farm Wines finds boutique, family-owned, small-scale wineries and bring their wine to the US for our tasting pleasure. This is supporting regenerative agriculture at it’s finest and it tastes delicious. Better, not more! This is guilt-free wine, my friends. Paleo, Keto, and diet-friendly. You must try Dry Farm Wines MUCH better wines. You can get either 3, 6, or 12 bottles delivered to your door monthly. Drink Dry Farm Wines with Ang and Shaye!  https://www.dryfarmwines.com/homemakerchic

THANK YOU!  American Blossom linens for being the official SEASON 8 SPONSOR!
Invest once!  Enjoy forever!   The ONLY ORGANIC, ALL AMERICAN-made sheets on the market! American Blossom Linens / americanblossomlinens.com / Coupon Code: HOMEMAKERCHIC20

American Blossom Linens / americanblossomlinens.com / Coupon Code: HOMEMAKERCHIC20 Summer is here.  We are line drying or linens or lounging in bed after a long day of gardening and we are doing both of these things with our American Blossom Linens.  Invest ONCE, enjoy for a lifetime.

item.title: Ready to Homeschool?
item.description:
The countdown is on and we're growing strong.  With the homeschool population doubling this past year, it's time to talk prep, routines, and what we'll be doing differently!

For clean, refreshing wines: https://www.dryfarmwines.com/homemakerchic

Dry Farm Wines is a wine supplier that sources organic, biodynamic, naturally yeasted, low-sugar, lower-alcohol wines from all over the world. Dry Farm Wines finds boutique, family-owned, small-scale wineries and brings their wine to the US for our tasting pleasure. This is supporting regenerative agriculture at its finest and it tastes delicious. As Dry Farm customers, we get to share in their love for organic, natural, and traditionally made wines. Better, not more! This is guilt-free wine, my friends. Paleo, Keto, and diet-friendly. You must try Dry Farm Wines MUCH better wines. item.title: Season 8: Make YOUR BED, (it's not what you think)
item.description:
We're BAAAAAAACK! After a little two-week break (so we could order our homeschool supplies and take a hot minute) and we are diving DEEP into this theme for Season 8 of "Make Your Bed".  Literally AND Figuratively.  We're preaching to the choir (ourselves) about the actual dust bunnies under our beds and what a made bed may or may not signify. 

THANK YOU!  American Blossom linens for being the official SEASON 8 SPONSOR!

item.title: Houston... We Have a Problem
item.description:
Holy Elon Batman!  The problem is there's only 5 weeks left and our computers hate us!  Our tech troubles about did us in today but we did our best to rally and share with you our thoughts on having intention fun this second half of summer.  Smell the roses, see the romance... all the things, in between technical difficulties!

CUE THE WINE MUSIC 'cause we're gonna need it!

For clean, refreshing wines: https://www.dryfarmwines.com/homemakerchic 

Dry Farm Wines is wine supplier that sources organic, biodynamic, naturally yeasted, low-sugar, lower-alcohol wines from all over the world. Dry Farm Wines finds boutique, family-owned, small-scale wineries and bring their wine to the US for our tasting pleasure. This is supporting regenerative agriculture at it’s finest and it tastes delicious. As Dry Farm customers, we get to share in their love for organic, natural and traditionally made wines. Better, not more! This is guilt-free wine, my friends. Paleo, Keto, and diet-friendly. You must try Dry Farm Wines MUCH better wines. You can get either 3, 6, or 12 bottles delivered to your door monthly. Drink Dry Farm Wines with Ang and Shaye!  https://www.dryfarmwines.com/homemakerchic

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS
Join Angela's OLD WORLD DESIGN SOCIETY / oldworld.parisiennefarmgirl.com A unique combination of a magazine publication and a private online design group with private lessons taught by Angela! -The Old World Design Society is a place for individuals who cherish the elements of a bygone era. Visit oldworld.parisiennefarmgirl.com Grab the Summer edition NOW!

American Blossom Linens / americanblossomlinens.com / Coupon Code: HOMEMAKERCHIC20 Summer is here.  We are line drying or linens or lounging in bed after a long day of gardening and we are doing both of these things with our American Blossom Linens.  Invest ONCE, enjoy for a lifetime.

item.itunes:author: Angela Reed & Shaye Elliott

item.itunes:title: The Working Moms Episode Part II
item.title: The Working Moms Episode Part II
item.description:
Well, you asked for it.  Two hours of us hashing out our thoughts on being working moms.  What does it mean?  What's the history behind working moms?  How do we all do all that we do?  Join us and hold onto your socks as we formulate many thoughts live in today's continuation of this conversation.

CUE THE WINE MUSIC 'cause we're gonna need it!

For clean, refreshing wines: https://www.dryfarmwines.com/homemakerchic 

Dry Farm Wines is wine supplier that sources organic, biodynamic, naturally yeasted, low-sugar, lower-alcohol wines from all over the world. Dry Farm Wines finds boutique, family-owned, small-scale wineries and bring their wine to the US for our tasting pleasure. This is supporting regenerative agriculture at it’s finest and it tastes delicious. As Dry Farm customers, we get to share in their love for organic, natural and traditionally made wines. Better, not more! This is guilt-free wine, my friends. Paleo, Keto, and diet-friendly. You must try Dry Farm Wines MUCH better wines. You can get either 3, 6, or 12 bottles delivered to your door monthly. Drink Dry Farm Wines with Ang and Shaye!  https://www.dryfarmwines.com/homemakerchic

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS
TRADE COFEE: www.drinktrade.com/homemaker
Let Trade curate coffee just for you!  Take the quiz, let them know your style and they will select freshly roasted coffee and deliver right to your door at PEAK freshness!  We LOVE Trade coffee for our mid-show lattes and you'll love it every day!

The Elliott Homestead Cooking Community / cook.theelliotthomestead.com This is for those home cooks out there who would love some new inspiration, ideas, and motivation in the kitchen. Each month, I create five brand new, whole-food, price-conscious, from-scratch recipes each month and either ship them to you physically in the mail or deliver them to your inbox – whichever you prefer.

Toups & Co  www.toupsandco.com Coupon Code: HOMEMAKER  Toups and Co. is your one-stop online shop for all things natural and organic. They do things differently! This is a company created by my friend Emily who has taken quality ingredients in makeup, skincare, and more to an entirely new level.

SHOW SOME LOVE

Homemaker Chic is made possible by our Patrons. If you’d like to show some love to the podcast for just $10 a month, and get video forms of all the episodes and much more, you can do that over on Patreon right here. THANK YOU Patrons – we love you! If you’d like to submit topic requests, you can do that by emailing Shaye and Angela at info@homemakerchicpodcast.com

  • Angela 
    • www.parisiennefarmgirl.com
    • oldworld.parisiennefarmgirl.com
    • www.youtube.com/c/ParisienneFarmgirl/featured
    • Instagram @parisiennefarmgirl
  • Shaye
    • www.theelliotthomestead.com

item.itunes:author: Angela Reed & Shaye Elliott

item.itunes:title: On Beauty and Thin Ice
item.title: On Beauty and Thin Ice
item.description:
Today's episode is all a 'kerfuffle' as we touch top layers of what beauty means to a home, where it comes from (in reflection of our world view), and Angela gets 'farklempt' as she refuses to hold back on Harry and The Mrs.'  award for declaring the permanent size of their family.  Forget one square of toilet paper....Don't worry, Shaye's got her back and sets the record straight about what GOD says about the arrows in our quiver.   
Oh yeah- we're breaking all the rules today.  Don't say we didn't warn you.

For clean, refreshing wines: https://www.dryfarmwines.com/homemakerchicsparkling
Dry Farm Wines is a wine supplier that sources organic, biodynamic, naturally yeasted, low-sugar, lower-alcohol wines from all over the world. Dry Farm Wines finds boutique, family-owned, small-scale wineries and brings their wine to the US for our tasting pleasure. This is supporting regenerative agriculture at its finest and it tastes delicious. As Dry Farm customers, we get to share in their love for organic, natural and traditionally made wines. Better, not more! This is guilt-free wine, my friends. Paleo, Keto, and diet-friendly. You must try Dry Farm Wines MUCH better wines. You can get either 3, 6, or 12 bottles delivered to your door monthly. Drink Dry Farm Wines with Ang and Shaye!  https://www.dryfarmwines.com/homemakerchicbubbly

The Elliott Homestead Cooking Community / cook.theelliotthomestead.com This is for those home cooks out there who would love some new inspiration, ideas, and motivation in the kitchen. Each month, I create five brand new, whole-food, price-conscious, from-scratch recipes each month and either ship them to you physically in the mail or deliver them to your inbox – whichever you prefer.

SHOW SOME LOVE
Want to see Angela's face when she realized how she pronounced today's wine?
Homemaker Chic is made possible by our Patrons. If you’d like to show some love to the podcast for just $10 a month and get video forms of all the episodes and much more, you can do that over on Patreon right here. THANK YOU, Patrons – we love you! If you’d like to submit topic requests, you can do that by emailing Shaye and Angela at info@homemakerchicpodcast.com

SOCIAL LINKS

Angela
www.parisiennefarmgirl.com

www.youtube.com/c/ParisienneFarmgirl/featured
Instagram @parisiennefarmgirl
Shaye
www.theelliotthomestead.com
www.youtube.com/c/Theelliotthomestead/featured
Instagram @shayeelliott

item.itunes:title: To Grass or Not to Grass (A Gardening Episode)
item.title: To Grass or Not to Grass (A Gardening Episode)
item.description:
Tired of fighting tooth and nail for a lovely garden? Or are you simply a beautiful house plant kind of girl?  Gardener or not, we've got a rich conversation for you today as we decide, grass or no grass?

item.itunes:author: Angela Reed & Shaye Elliott

item.itunes:title: Tofu, Baby, Banana, Hammock.
item.title: Tofu, Baby, Banana, Hammock.
item.description:
From inappropriately mispronounced bottles of wine to tofu, baby, banana, hammock.  We're shooting the breeze today.  Lamenting the preferability of being eaten by a cougar over being eaten by a bear and wondering aloud why trolls can't leave Monty alone.  What does this have to do with homemaking?  Well, hopefully, it makes for good laundry folding entertainment.
Don't mind us.  We're just two best friends who haven't talked all week.

For clean, refreshing wines: https://www.dryfarmwines.com/homemakerchicsparkling
Today's wine name is Muschelkalk... "KALK" :)
Dry Farm Wines is a wine supplier that sources organic, biodynamic, naturally yeasted, low-sugar, lower-alcohol wines from all over the world. Dry Farm Wines finds boutique, family-owned, small-scale wineries and brings their wine to the US for our tasting pleasure. This is supporting regenerative agriculture at its finest and it tastes delicious. As Dry Farm customers, we get to share in their love for organic, natural and traditionally made wines. Better, not more! This is guilt-free wine, my friends. Paleo, Keto, and diet-friendly. You must try Dry Farm Wines MUCH better wines. item.content:encoded:
From inappropriately mispronounced bottles of wine to tofu, baby, banana, hammock.  We're shooting the breeze today.  Lamenting the preferability of being eaten by a cougar over being eaten by a bear and wondering aloud why trolls can't leave Monty alone.  What does this have to do with homemaking?  Well, hopefully, it makes for good laundry folding entertainment.
Don't mind us.  We're just two best friends who haven't talked all week.

For clean, refreshing wines: https://www.dryfarmwines.com/homemakerchicsparkling
Today's wine name is Muschelkalk... "KALK" :)
Dry Farm Wines is a wine supplier that sources organic, biodynamic, naturally yeasted, low-sugar, lower-alcohol wines from all over the world. Dry Farm Wines finds boutique, family-owned, small-scale wineries and brings their wine to the US for our tasting pleasure. This is supporting regenerative agriculture at its finest and it tastes delicious. As Dry Farm customers, we get to share in their love for organic, natural and traditionally made wines. Better, not more! This is guilt-free wine, my friends. Paleo, Keto, and diet-friendly. You must try Dry Farm Wines MUCH better wines. You can get either 3, 6, or 12 bottles delivered to your door monthly. Drink Dry Farm Wines with Ang and Shaye!  https://www.dryfarmwines.com/homemakerchicbubbly

The Elliott Homestead Cooking Community / cook.theelliotthomestead.com This is for those home cooks out there who would love some new inspiration, ideas, and motivation in the kitchen. Each month, I create five brand new, whole-food, price-conscious, from-scratch recipes each month and either ship them to you physically in the mail or deliver them to your inbox – whichever you prefer.

item.content:encoded:
Summertime and the livin' is easy  (Sing it ELLA!)
Today we're talking about how YOU can bust some signature moves in the summer kitchen for delicious entertaining and enjoyment. Angela explains true Strawberry Shortcake and why she LOVES, loves, LOVES mayonnaise, and Shaye busts some Spatchcocking.   
Yes, Spatchcocking.

We're Enjoying Summer so...CUE THE WINE MUSIC!

For clean, refreshing wines: https://www.dryfarmwines.com/homemakerchic

Dry Farm Wines is a wine supplier that sources organic, biodynamic, naturally yeasted, low-sugar, lower-alcohol wines from all over the world. Dry Farm Wines finds boutique, family-owned, small-scale wineries and brings their wine to the US for our tasting pleasure. This is supporting regenerative agriculture at its finest and it tastes delicious. As Dry Farm customers, we get to share in their love for organic, natural and traditionally made wines. Better, not more! This is guilt-free wine, my friends. Paleo, Keto, and diet-friendly. You must try Dry Farm Wines MUCH better wines. item.itunes:title: We're Back with the BLOOM!?
item.title: We're Back with the BLOOM!?
item.description:
What does Jane Austen have to say about health, glow, and exercise?  What IS the 'bloom of full health'? Find out with us today as we launch Season SEVEN with our favorite gentleman of gentlemen, author Bryan Koslowski.  We're going to chat about the Jane Austen Diet and why it's good for EVERY homemaker.

CUE THE WINE MUSIC!

For clean, refreshing wines: https://www.dryfarmwines.com/homemakerchic 

Dry Farm Wines is wine supplier that sources organic, biodynamic, naturally yeasted, low-sugar, lower-alcohol wines from all over the world. Dry Farm Wines finds boutique, family-owned, small-scale wineries and bring their wine to the US for our tasting pleasure. This is supporting regenerative agriculture at it’s finest and it tastes delicious. As Dry Farm customers, we get to share in their love for organic, natural and traditionally made wines. Better, not more! This is guilt-free wine, my friends. Paleo, Keto, and diet-friendly. You must try Dry Farm Wines MUCH better wines. You can get either 3, 6, or 12 bottles delivered to your door monthly. Drink Dry Farm Wines with Ang and Shaye!  https://www.dryfarmwines.com/homemakerchic

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS
Ana Luisa www.analuisa.com/homemaker for 10% off.  Show off your beautiful jewelry on Friday's with #ultrafemininefriday.   Their pieces are timeless, affordable and fall under our podcast motto of ‘better, not more’. New jewelry collections are released every Friday so celebrate our #ultrafemininefriday with us by visiting analuisa.com/homemaker for 10% off.

Toups & Co  www.toupsandco.com Coupon Code: HOMEMAKER  Toups and Co. is your one-stop online shop for all things natural and organic. They do things differently! This is a company created by my friend Emily who has taken quality ingredients in makeup, skincare, and more to an entirely new level.

The Elliott Homestead Cooking Community / cook.theelliotthomestead.com This is for those home cooks out there who would love some new inspiration, ideas, and motivation in the kitchen. Each month, I create five brand new, whole-food, price-conscious, from-scratch recipes each month and either ship them to you physically in the mail or deliver them to your inbox – whichever you prefer.

SHOW SOME LOVE

Homemaker Chic is made possible by our Patrons. If you’d like to show some love to the podcast for just $10 a month, and get video forms of all the episodes and much more, you can do that over on Patreon right here. THANK YOU Patrons – we love you! If you’d like to submit topic requests, you can do that by emailing Shaye and Angela at info@homemakerchicpodcast.com

item.itunes:title: 1,000,000 Reasons We Love YOU!
item.title: 1,000,000 Reasons We Love YOU!
item.description:
Celebrate ONE MILLION downloads and our 100th episode in this Season SIX Finale!  
WE DID IT!  Thanks to YOU we hit one million downloads (1,080,193) to be exact and we have that many reasons to celebrate!  So we're sharing with you some of our favorite parts about homemaking and what's giving us 'all the feels' lately!

NEW MERCH SHOP!  https://bit.ly/HCmerchshop

  • Aprons!
  • Coffee Mugs
  • T-shirts
  • Sweatshirts
  • Notebooks and more from your favorite podcast!


FOLLOW US ON INSTAGRAM for our 100th Episode Celebration Giveaway!
Follow @homemakerchicpodcast and tag a friend, heck tag a hundred friends, to be entered in our huge gift-away including gifts from all our sponsors!   

  • A queen size set of American Blossom Linens
  • A lovely gift from Dry Farm Wines
  • A 'Red Wine' lipstick from Toups and Co. and more!

Help us round out these great numbers by hitting 10,000 on Instagram.  (Just 520 to go!) Tell your friends to follow us by tagging them on the giveaway post!

ARE YOU A PATRON YET?

Join us at Patreon.com/homemakerchic NOW and mark your calendars for the quarterly Fan Girl call!  5/21/21 4 pm Central!   The first 100 attendees will be allowed into this private hang-out with Angela and Shaye!



CUE THE WINE MUSIC!  How about some celebratory bubbly!?

For clean, refreshing wines: https://www.dryfarmwines.com/homemakerchic 

Dry Farm Wines is wine supplier that sources organic, biodynamic, naturally yeasted, low-sugar, lower-alcohol wines from all over the world. Dry Farm Wines finds boutique, family-owned, small-scale wineries and bring their wine to the US for our tasting pleasure. You must try Dry Farm Wines MUCH better wines. You can get either 3, 6, or 12 bottles delivered to your door monthly. Drink Dry Farm Wines with Ang and Shaye!  https://www.dryfarmwines.com/homemakerchic

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS

American Blossom Linens / americanblossomlinens.com / Coupon Code: HOMEMAKERCHIC20

Softer with each washing, these are our FAVORITE sheets. As fans of vintage linens, these are the best sheets EV-ER. With a process called ‘combing’, all the rough fibers are pulled out of this organic, Texas-grown cotton. This creates the softest, most beautiful sheets for your home.  Woven to last a LIFETIME. Invest once and never again with American Blossom Linens.

Jovial Foods / www.jovialfoods.com 

Jovial Foods is a company that supplies us homemakers with the most gorgeous baking flours and foods. Jovial is most well known for their einkorn flour, which is a high-protein, weak gluten flour that bakes up buttery and rich.  Visit them at jovialfoods.com and enjoy their free shipping!

Today's show is also brought to you by Toups and Co. Organics!  https://www.toupsandco.com/ Coupon Code HOMEMAKER for 10% off
Toups and Co. is your one-stop online shop for all things natural and organic. Try the red wine lipstick and enjoy feeling dressed up, even if it’s just for your children or chickens. Visit toupsandco.com to stock your bathroom and makeup case with pure, beautiful products from Toups & Co. Visit https://www.toupsandco.com

item.itunes:title: Spilled Eggs and Secret Salsa?
item.title: Spilled Eggs and Secret Salsa?
item.description:
To view the entire episode in video form, become a Patron of Homemaker Chic right here.

Spilled Eggs and Secret Salsa.   We did WHAT?  Join us as we recount our memorable Mother's Day experiences (including lots of sweating and an HGTV Marathon) and then we move on to some rather awkward confessions of rotten chicken stock, Shaye's 8 dozen spilled eggs, and how Ang closed the drawer on spilled salsa... literally.

CUE THE WINE MUSIC!

For clean, refreshing wines: https://www.dryfarmwines.com/homemakerchic 

Dry Farm Wines is wine supplier that sources organic, biodynamic, naturally yeasted, low-sugar, lower-alcohol wines from all over the world. Dry Farm Wines finds boutique, family owned, small scale wineries and bring their wine to the US for our tasting pleasure. This is supporting regenerative agriculture at it’s finest and it tastes delicious. As Dry Farm customers, we get to share in their love for organic, natural, and traditionally made wines. Better, not more! This is guilt free wine, my friends. Paleo, Keto, and diet friendly. You must try Dry Farm Wines MUCH better wines. You can get either 3, 6, or 12 bottles delivered to your door monthly. Drink Dry Farm Wines with Ang and Shaye and get a free bottle with your first order!  https://www.dryfarmwines.com/homemakerchic

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS

OLD WORLD DESIGN SOCIETY / oldworld.parisiennefarmgirl.com

SPRING PRE-SALE GOES LIVE on 3/26!  GET YOUR PRINT VERSION! The Old World Design Society is a place for individuals who cherish the elements of a bygone era. It’s for people who live by the motto that ‘new is not always better’ and have a collective love for the lived-in spaces and heirloom pieces that make a ‘house’ a ‘home’. Craving inspiration? Velvet sofas, gilded frames, ironstone, hand-sewn linens, vintage books, regal estates, and charming cottages? As a part of the Old World Design Society, you’ll have access to rich, inspiring creativity and education and, best of all, you’ll meet friends who speak your language. Enjoy a quarterly publication (paper or digital), online group support, design challenges, early access to Angela’s Private Collection Sales and more! Get your Winter edition before it’s GONE and get your SPRING COPY before they sell out!


SHOW SOME LOVE

Homemaker Chic is made possible by our Patrons. If you’d like to show some love to the podcast for just $10 a month, and get video forms of all the episodes and much more, you can do that over on Patreon right here. THANK YOU Patrons – we love you! If you’d like to submit topic requests, you can do that by emailing Shaye and Angela at info@homemakerchicpodcast.com

CHEERS!
item.content:encoded:
To view the entire episode in video form, become a Patron of Homemaker Chic right here.

Spilled Eggs and Secret Salsa.   We did WHAT?  Join us as we recount our memorable Mother's Day experiences (including lots of sweating and an HGTV Marathon) and then we move on to some rather awkward confessions of rotten chicken stock, Shaye's 8 dozen spilled eggs, and how Ang closed the drawer on spilled salsa... literally.

CUE THE WINE MUSIC!

For clean, refreshing wines: https://www.dryfarmwines.com/homemakerchic 

Dry Farm Wines is wine supplier that sources organic, biodynamic, naturally yeasted, low-sugar, lower-alcohol wines from all over the world. Dry Farm Wines finds boutique, family owned, small scale wineries and bring their wine to the US for our tasting pleasure. This is supporting regenerative agriculture at it’s finest and it tastes delicious. As Dry Farm customers, we get to share in their love for organic, natural, and traditionally made wines. Better, not more! This is guilt free wine, my friends. Paleo, Keto, and diet friendly. You must try Dry Farm Wines MUCH better wines. You can get either 3, 6, or 12 bottles delivered to your door monthly. Drink Dry Farm Wines with Ang and Shaye and get a free bottle with your first order!  https://www.dryfarmwines.com/homemakerchic

item.itunes:title: Wait, This Job Needs a Uniform?
item.title: Wait, This Job Needs a Uniform?
item.description:
Join us today as we welcome honorary Homemaker Chic Podcast co-host, Jennifer Scott of 'Madame Chic' fame.  We're looking at her 10 Item Capsule Wardrobe and how it impacts the Homemakers choice of uniform.  And you thought the Homemaker doesn't need a uniform?  We invite you to think again.

You need refreshing, CLEAN, small farm Wine for Spring!!!

item.itunes:title: Walk the Romantic Garden
item.title: Walk the Romantic Garden
item.description:
No cabbage how-tos or no weed prevention here.  Today we are taking a turn, a romantic stroll thru the garden.  Poems, favorite books, quotes, and all our ponderings on the garden and its impact on our five senses.

Pour a glass of Dry Farm Wines and walk the gardens with us?  Perhaps a rosé?
Cue the wine music!
You need refreshing, CLEAN Wine for Spring!!!
https://www.dryfarmwines.com/homemakerchicrose You can get either 3,6 or 12 bottles delivered to your door monthly. Drink Dry Farm Wines with Ang and Shaye!
Try our new Rose special for Spring!   Three bottles of rosé plus a bonus bottle for a penny!  https://www.dryfarmwines.com/homemakerchicrose

item.itunes:title: So You DON'T Want to be a Homesteader
item.title: So You DON'T Want to be a Homesteader
item.description:
Farming.  It's not for everyone, but we've had some requests on how to bring all the farmy feels into life 'in town'.  Today Angela and Shaye are sharing with you the little changes we made on our own homes and routines long before we each had a dairy cow.  Farming was our dream, it's not everyone's dream... but who doesn't love a breeze blowing thru an open window and a farm-fresh egg.  Join us today as we give our best ideas on all the farm vibes from home decor to stocking your fridge, no matter where you live.

You need refreshing, CLEAN, small farm Wine for Spring!!! CUE THE WINE MUSIC!
https://www.dryfarmwines.com/homemakerchic Today’s “What We’re Sipping” segment is brought to you by Dry Farm Wines is an online wine subscription that pairs organic, biodynamic, naturally yeasted, low-sugar, lower-alcohol wines from all over the world. As Dry Farm customers, we get to share in their love for organic, natural, and traditionally made wines.  “better, not more.” So check out their better wines. You can get either 3,6 or 12 bottles delivered to your door monthly. Drink Dry Farm Wines with Ang and Shaye!

Today's show is also brought to by:
https://www.americanblossomlinens.com
These are craftsman sewn sheets that are sustainably grown, dyed, and manufactured. Use coupon code HOMEMAKERCHIC2O for a 20% discount.

and

cook.theelliotthomestead.com 
The Cooking Community was created for all the women out there who are needing some motivation to thrive in their kitchen.  Each month, I create five brand new whole-food based recipes from my cottage kitchen. You can grow in confidence in your skills and feel peace in knowing that these recipes are nourishing you and your family.

item.itunes:title: Permission to Join the Apron Clad Army
item.title: Permission to Join the Apron Clad Army
item.description:
We've been waiting for this one!  Join us as we get to know Alena Pettitt of The Darling Academy.  She's been called the 'bravest woman in England' and now we know why!   From a London beauty industry marketing guru to Homemaker advocate extraordinaire, she's building an apron-clad army, giving permission to women around the world to make the choice to be a homemaker! 
We're going to be looking into stereotypes, judgment, and why as women, we can make any choice we want and be applauded... except THAT choice.

Cue the wine music!
You need refreshing, CLEAN Wine for Spring!!! CUE THE WINE MUSIC!
https://www.dryfarmwines.com/homemakerchicrose Today’s “What We’re Sipping” segment is brought to you by Dry Farm Wines is an online wine subscription that pairs organic, biodynamic, naturally yeasted, low-sugar, lower-alcohol wines from all over the world. As Dry Farm customers, we get to share in their love for organic, natural, and traditionally made wines.  “better, not more.” So check out their better wines. You can get either 3,6 or 12 bottles delivered to your door monthly. Drink Dry Farm Wines with Ang and Shaye!
Try our new Rose special for Spring!   Three bottles of rosé plus a bonus bottle for a penny!  https://www.dryfarmwines.com/homemakerchicrose

Today's show is brought to you by the OLD WORLD DESIGN SOCIETY!   https://www.parisiennefarmgirl.com/old-world-design-society Just 100 copies of the print publication left!  The Old World Design Society is a place for individuals who cherish the elements of a bygone era. It’s for people who live by the motto that ‘new is not always better’ and have a collective love for the lived-in spaces and heirloom pieces that make a ‘house’ a ‘home’. Craving inspiration? Velvet sofas, gilded frames, ironstone, hand-sewn linens, vintage books, regal estates, and charming cottages? Enjoy a quarterly publication (paper or digital), online group support, design challenges, early access to Angela's Private Collection Sales, and more!  https://www.parisiennefarmgirl.com/old-world-design-society/

item.itunes:title: We're PRO Procrastinators!
item.title: We're PRO Procrastinators!
item.description:
It's not you.  It's us.
OK, maybe it's you too.  We're in this TOGETHER and today we are looking at procrastination with our Thursday panties on.  Do we need to grow up?  Own it?  Make changes and move FORWARD in this area?  We do. 
Do you?

PS: Angela finally called the dentist.

Don't procrastinate on cueing the wine music!
You need refreshing, CLEAN Wine for Spring!!! CUE THE WINE MUSIC!
https://www.dryfarmwines.com/homemakerchic Today’s “What We’re Sipping” segment is brought to you by Dry Farm Wines is an online wine subscription that pairs organic, biodynamic, naturally yeasted, low-sugar, lower-alcohol wines from all over the world. As Dry Farm customers, we get to share in their love for organic, natural, and traditionally made wines.  “better, not more.” So check out their better wines. You can get either 3,6 or 12 bottles delivered to your door monthly. Drink Dry Farm Wines with Ang and Shaye!
Try our new Rose special for Spring!   Three bottles of rosé plus a bonus bottle for a penny!
DON'T PROCRASTINATE!  https://www.dryfarmwines.com/homemakerchicrose

WE SHEET YOU NOT!
https://www.americanblossomlinens.com
Established in 1899, American Blossom Linens is an all-American company that turns organic, Texas grown cotton into old-fashioned, dye-free, chemical-free sheets and linens. Here’s a great review called “I Sheet You Not”: Honestly, I have searched a long time for sheets that not only have a certain feel, but are made in the USA. My search is over because of the fantastic product produced by American Blossom Linens. These sheets fit and hug the bed, which means my husband, a restless sleeper, can’t untuck these fitted sheets. There’s extra length and width to the top sheet, and even pillowcases are little longer. I loved these sheets that are crisp and heavy, but with substance not so much with weight, so much that I bought three more sets - one for each of our married kids! A big plus for me is the option of king or standard pillowcases with your order. Worth every penny!!! mThese sheets feel fabulous on your skin, keep you cool in the heat of the spring and summer, and will actually grow softer the more you wash them. These are craftsman sewn sheets are sustainably grown, dyed, and manufactured. Use coupon code HOMEMAKERCHIC2O for a 20% discount.

COOK WITH SHAYE!
Today’s episode of the podcast is also brought to you by The Elliott Homestead Cooking Community. That’s cook.theelliotthomestead.com. The Cooking Community was created for all the women out there who are needing some motivation to thrive in their kitchen. It’s easy to get discouraged when you’re feeling uninspired or underskilled - when you’re in the ditch of serving the same thing over and over again and not finding joy in preparing food for you or your friends or your family. The Cooking Community is here to help you feel joy and inspiration in your kitchen once again! Each month, I create five brand new whole-food based recipes from my cottage kitchen. You can grow in confidence in your skills and feel peace in knowing that these recipes are nourishing you and your family. I’m here to help you learn to bake! Learn to use sourdough! Learn to roast meats! Learn to preserve and enjoy new vegetables! Learn to try new ingredients! And to fall in love with cooking again. I want you to visit cook.theelliotthomestead.com (link in show notes if you need it) and select what exclusive membership level fits your home best.

item.itunes:title: Gird Your Loins... Again?
item.title: Gird Your Loins... Again?
item.description:
So, apparently, after each of us having a long, emotional weekend, we had a lot bound up inside.  We're chatting how to handle rude people, The Queen's loss... Covid restrictions... it's a pinball conversation,  improvisation chat about "changing the world", "fame" and how the current tension in the county can influence the mindset of the homemaker.

item.title: 10 Things! Right Now!

The Old World Design Society is a place for individuals who cherish the elements of a bygone era. It’s for people who live by the motto that ‘new is not always better’ and have a collective love for the lived-in spaces and heirloom pieces that make a ‘house’ a ‘home’. Craving inspiration? Velvet sofas, gilded frames, ironstone, hand-sewn linens, vintage books, regal estates, and charming cottages? As a part of the Old World Design Society, you’ll have access to rich, inspiring creativity and education and, best of all, you’ll meet friends who speak your language. Enjoy a quarterly publication (paper or digital), online group support, design challenges, early access to Angela's Private Collection Sales and more! Get your Winter edition before it's GONE and get your SPRING COPY before they sell out! https://www.parisiennefarmgirl.com/old-world-design-society/

item.itunes:title: Signature Moves and Secret Weapons Revisited
item.title: Signature Moves and Secret Weapons Revisited
item.description:
From nose jobs to alarm clocks. This is another conversation where we share what's working, and lament the padding out bras still need.

Jovial Foods is an amazing company, run by husband and wife team Carla and Rodolfo. After they discovered years ago that their daughter had a gluten sensitivity, they struck out to find grains that her body could easily digest and thrive off eating – and that led them to einkorn. Now, Jovial Foods is the top supplier of einkorn flours, einkorn pastas, Italian olive oils, prepackaged einkorn snacks, and the top-rated gluten-free pasta line. This flour will change your baking world! Use coupon code HOMEMAKER to get 10%  off your order!

You need refreshing, CLEAN Wine for Spring!!! CUE THE WINE MUSIC!

item.itunes:title: Favorite Home Projects
item.title: Favorite Home Projects
item.description:
What trends are we loving?  What needs to GO? What have we done in our homes in the last year that has made the biggest impact? Tune in!

You need refreshing, CLEAN Wine for Spring!!! CUE THE WINE MUSIC!
 https://www.dryfarmwines.com/homemakerchic Today’s “What We’re Sipping” segment is brought to you by Dry Farm Wines is an online wine subscription that pairs organic, biodynamic, naturally yeasted, low-sugar, lower-alcohol wines from all over the world. As Dry Farm customers, we get to share in their love for organic, natural, and traditionally made wines.  “better, not more.” So check out their better wines. You can get either 3,6 or 12 bottles delivered to your door monthly. Drink Dry Farm Wines with Ang and Shaye!   https://www.dryfarmwines.com/homemakerchic

Today’s episode of the podcast is brought to you by The Elliott Homestead Cooking Community. This is for those home cooks out there who would love some new inspiration, ideas, and motivation in the kitchen. Each month, I create five brand new, whole-food, price-conscious, from-scratch recipes each month and either ship them to you physically in the mail or deliver them to your inbox - whichever you prefer. Recipes will range from entrees to side dishes, to desserts, to breads, to breakfast, to vegetables and salads, to soups - and everything in between. I’ll also guide you through the month’s recipes with a long, in-depth cooking video showing you new skills and encouraging you as you give the recipes a try in your own kitchen! And lastly (but certainly not least) is our private, exclusive community of like-minded home cooks who are looking to learn and grow in their kitchen - this is a place for you to ask questions, share your successes, encourage others, and gain inspiration from women just like you! The Elliott Homestead Cooking Community is here to inspire and nourish your family! We’re going to teach you to bake! To use sourdough! To try new ingredients!  Visit cook.theelliotthomestead.com for more information. cook.theelliotthomestead.com

 Today's show is also brought to you by Toups and Co. Organics!
Toups and Co. is your one-stop online shop for all things natural and organic. This is a company created by my friend Emily who has taken quality ingredients in makeup, skincare, and more to an entirely new level. Emily has stocked Toups and Co. with tallow balms, deodorant, shampoo, soap, foundation, lipstick, skin tonics, eyeshadow, and much, much more. Emily dreams of women using her makeup and skincare products with confidence, knowing that their putting the purest, most natural ingredients onto their bodies and enjoying the pleasure that comes with taking the very best care of your skin and body. Try the Frankincense tallow balm and feel the whipped, silky pleasure of massaging it into your chapped garden hands. Try the red wine lipstick and enjoy feeling dressed up, even if it’s just for your children or chickens. Visit toupsandco.com to stock your bathroom and makeup case with pure, beautiful products from Toups & Co. Visit https://www.toupsandco.com (t-o-u-p-s) and use coupon code HOMEMAKER for 10% off your order.

item.title: We Dig on No Dig
item.description:

item.title: Homemaking, It Doesn't Just HAPPEN
item.description:
Good meals, tidy drawers, hospitality... who do you think of when you think of an all-star homemaker.  We've got news for you (and US).  It doesn't just HAPPEN!   Chances are, that woman you look up to has made intentional decisions in her home and sacrifices along the way.  Join us as we take an introductory look into this season's theme.  "It Doesn't Just Happen!"

item.content:encoded:
Good meals, tidy drawers, hospitality... who do you think of when you think of an all-star homemaker.  We've got news for you (and US).  It doesn't just HAPPEN!   Chances are, that woman you look up to has made intentional decisions in her home and sacrifices along the way.  Join us as we take an introductory look into this season's theme.  "It Doesn't Just Happen!"

CUE THE WINE MUSIC:

item.itunes:title: Season 6 Premiere! Homemaker Chic Does NOLA!
item.title: Season 6 Premiere! Homemaker Chic Does NOLA!
item.description:
We're back girlfriends!  And we did something VERY special during our break in between Seasons 5 and 6.  Tune in and listen in on all our memories, and learn all the things Ang does that drive Shaye crazy...when she's not too busy ordering Angela's coffee for her that is.

We want to thank you for listening to our sponsors and supporting them. Homemaker Chic wouldn’t be here without these advertisers and so we really want to thank you for giving us just a few minutes of your time to share these great companies with you.

BECOME A PATRON for Ultimate Homemaker Perks!  Visit:
www.Patreon.com/HomemakerChicPodcast
 
Today's show is brought to you by the OLD WORLD DESIGN SOCIETY!
https://www.parisiennefarmgirl.com/old-world-design-society/
SPRING PRE-SALE GOES LIVE on 3/26!  GET YOUR PRINT VERSION!
The Old World Design Society is a place for individuals who cherish the elements of a bygone era. It’s for people who live by the motto that ‘new is not always better’ and have a collective
love for the lived-in spaces and heirloom pieces that make a ‘house’ a ‘home’.
Craving inspiration?
Velvet sofas, gilded frames, ironstone, hand-sewn linens, vintage books, regal estates, and charming cottages? As a part of the Old World Design Society, you’ll have access to rich, inspiring creativity and education and, best of all, you’ll meet friends who speak your language.
Enjoy a quarterly publication (paper or digital), online group support, design challenges, early access to Angela's Private Collection Sales and more!
Get your Winter edition before it's GONE and get your SPRING COPY before they sell out!
https://www.parisiennefarmgirl.com/old-world-design-society/

Today's show is also brought to you by Toups and Co. Organics!
Toups and Co. is your one-stop online shop for all things natural and organic. This is a company created by my friend Emily who has taken quality ingredients in makeup, skincare, and more to an entirely new level. Emily has stocked Toups and Co. with tallow balms, deodorant, shampoo, soap, foundation, lipstick, skin tonics, eyeshadow, and much, much more. Emily dreams of women using her makeup and skincare products with confidence, knowing that their putting the purest, most natural ingredients onto their bodies and enjoying the pleasure that comes with taking the very best care of your skin and body. Try the Frankincense tallow balm and feel the whipped, silky pleasure of massaging it into your chapped garden hands. Try the red wine lipstick and enjoy feeling dressed up, even if it’s just for your children or chickens. Visit toupsandco.com to stock your bathroom and makeup case with pure, beautiful products from Toups & Co. Visit https://www.toupsandco.com (t-o-u-p-s) and use coupon code HOMEMAKER for 10% off your order.


Cue the WINE MUSIC!   https://www.dryfarmwines.com/homemakerchic​
Today’s “What We’re Sipping” segment is brought to you by Dry Farm Wines is an online wine subscription that pairs organic, biodynamic, naturally yeasted, low-sugar, lower-alcohol wines from all over the world. As Dry Farm customers, we get to share in their love for organic, natural, and traditionally made wines.  “better, not more.” So check out their better wines. You can get either 3,6 or 12 bottles delivered to your door monthly.
https://www.dryfarmwines.com/homemakerchic​

Shows we referenced:
Schitt's Creek (Crabappppple)

item.itunes:title: Staying Homemaker Chic - Jennifer L. Scott join us!
item.title: Staying Homemaker Chic - Jennifer L. Scott join us!
item.description:
We had our honorary co-host joing us again and we're having our favorite conversation!  How can the homemaker stay chic?  And then some!

Today's show is brought to you by Angela's OLD WORLD DESIGN SOCIETY!
The Old World Design Society is a place for individuals who cherish the elements of a bygone era. It’s for people who live by the motto that ‘new is not always better’ and have a collective
love for the lived-in spaces and heirloom pieces that make a ‘house’ a ‘home’.
Craving inspiration?
Velvet sofas, gilded frames, ironstone, hand-sewn linens, vintage books, regal estates, and charming cottages? If words like these are a part of your language, it can be difficult to find your way through a maze of all-white social media feeds. As a part of the Old World Design Society, you’ll have access to rich, inspiring creativity and education and, best of all, you’ll meet friends who speak your language.
Enjoy a quarterly publication (paper or digital), online group support, design challenges, early access to Angela's Private Collection Sales and more!
JOIN the WINTER SESSION at https://www.parisiennefarmgirl.com/old-world-design-society

Cue the WINE MUSIC!   https://www.dryfarmwines.com/homemakerchic
Today’s “What We’re Sipping” segment is brought to you by Dry Farm Wines is an online wine subscription that pairs organic, biodynamic, naturally yeasted, low-sugar, lower-alcohol wines from all over the world. As Dry Farm customers, we get to share in their love for organic, natural, and traditionally made wines.  “better, not more.” So check out their better wines. You can get either 3,6 or 12 bottles delivered to your door monthly.
Drink Dry Farm Wines with Ang and Shaye!   Shop and Sip at:   https://www.dryfarmwines.com/homemakerchic
Grab your three rosé and three reds here:  https://www.dryfarmwines.com/products/valentines-day?rfsn=2479198.660dce

Visit Jennifer at:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_8islec9USM
https://jenniferlscott.com/

item.title: Habits - Keep it Together Girlfriend!
item.description:

Today we're talking about habits and keeping it together.  No one likes an extreme hot mess.

Today's show is brought to you by Angela's OLD WORLD DESIGN SOCIETY!
The Old World Design Society is a place for individuals who cherish the elements of a bygone era. It’s for people who live by the motto that ‘new is not always better’ and have a collective

Enjoy a quarterly publication (paper or digital), online group support, design challenges, early access to Angela's Private Collection Sales and more!

Grab your three rosé and three reds here:  https://www.dryfarmwines.com/products/valentines-day?rfsn=2479198.660dce

item.title: Quarterly 'Fashion' Chat
item.description:

item.itunes:title: Our Current Inspiration
item.title: Our Current Inspiration
item.description:
Staying inspired as a homemaker is vital!  Today we're talking about what's inspiring us.  Shaye is fresh with new loves and Ang is turning back to the simplicity of old favorites!   

Wine has us inspired!  Cue the WINE MUSIC!    https://www.dryfarmwines.com/homemakerchic
Today’s “What We’re Sipping” segment is brought to you by Dry Farm Wines is an online wine subscription that pairs organic, biodynamic, naturally yeasted, low-sugar, lower-alcohol wines from all over the world. As Dry Farm customers, we get to share in their love for organic, natural and traditionally made wines.  “better, not more.” So check out their better wines. You can get either 3,6 or 12 bottles delivered to your door monthly.
Drink Dry Farm Wines with Ang and Shaye!   https://www.dryfarmwines.com/homemakerchic

Today's show is brought to you by:
Jovial Foods. Jovial Foods is a company that supplies us homemakers with the most gorgeous baking flours and foods. Jovial is most well known for their einkorn flour, which is a high-protein, weak gluten flour that bakes up buttery and rich.  Amelie made a delicious Einkorn chocolate cake this weekend.  My girls love to grab the Einkorn cookbook and try new things. This is a company that has an extreme love for high-quality ingredients which is why we welcome them into our pantries and into our kitchens. Visit them at jovialfoods.com and enjoy their free shipping! Coupon Code: HOMEMAKER

The Elliott Homestead Cooking Community cook.theelliotthomestead.com

NEW VIDEO VERSION OF THE SHOW!
Want to SEE the laughs, red lips, and stalking toddlers?  Become a Fan Girl Patron for our BIGGEST and latest perk ever!   Access to the VIDEO version of the show!   Now you can listen while you clean the house and WATCH while you snuggle up at night instead of Netflix.   As if your husband wasn't already sick of us!  Watch us eye roll, dance, and carry on as a Patron member you'll have TOTAL access to the video version of the show!   Visit https://www.Patreon.com/homemakerchic... to get hooked up!

item.title: Shield Maiden Veg Gardeners
item.description:
What we're planting this year!!!  But FIRST, we analyze Shaye's Bjorn Bun and Angela will give her wardrobe advice for being a true shield maiden, and hair style advice to avoid looking like a sumo wrestler.   (Seriously, become a see this hilarity!)  From beet varieties to zucchini.  We're going step by step through our seed orders for our 2021 gardens.   After we laugh.

Today's show is brought to you by Angela's OLD WORLD DESIGN SOCIETY!

Cue the WINE MUSIC!   https://bit.ly/ ryFarmWinewithHomemakerChic

You can get either 3,6 or 12 bottles delivered to your door monthly.

For more follow us at:
www.homemakerchicpodcast.com

item.itunes:title: We're BACK! With Jazz Hands!
item.title: We're BACK! With Jazz Hands!
item.description:
January is here and SO is Homemaker Chic!   
We're back and ready to CHOOSE.  OUR.  HARD. 
How much chaos and frustration do we bring into our homemaking by choosing the WRONG hard?  We're about to tell you all about what it means to "choose your hard" and why it's vital for the art of homemaking.
We've also got some (JAZZ HANDS!) BIG ANNOUNCEMENTS so settle in with a glass of Dry Farms and don't forget to tag us when you beg Monty to be on the show!

NEW VIDEO VERSION OF THE SHOW!
Want to SEE the laughs, red lips, and stalking toddlers?  Become a Fan Girl Patron for our BIGGEST and latest perk ever!   Access to the VIDEO version of the show!   Now you can listen while you clean the house and WATCH while you snuggle up at night instead of Netflix.   As if your husband wasn't already sick of us!  Watch us eye roll, dance, and carry on as a Patron member you'll have TOTAL access to the video version of the show!   Visit www.Patreon.com/homemakerchicpodcast to get hooked up!

Want to see the trailer?   Visit https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCaTho8rBecb5JRE-o2SfWpw

item.itunes:title: Is Your Tree Up Yet?
item.title: Is Your Tree Up Yet?
item.description:
It's the Monday before Christmas and clothes dryers are broken, bedrooms are messy but the trees are UP and we're still wearing our red lips.   Join Angela and Shaye for some Monday musings as they prep for the big day and wrestle with modern conveniences that won't cooperate with daily to-do lists.

item.itunes:title: And the Winner Is...
item.title: And the Winner Is...
item.description:
Dang.  This was a fun one. 
We covered it ALL and we announced a winner for the queen size sheets!
Shaye's musing a modern Renaissance and Angela finally broke down crying about Covid.   Has isolation pushed us towards a heightened state of contribution to humanity?  How long CAN a person sit and consume Netflix?   The mind reels... here we go!

THE HOLIDAYS ARE COMING! Get your "penny bottle" now by visiting https://www.dryfarmwines.com/homemakerchic
This is the part of the podcast where we encourage you to pour a glass of whatever scratches your itch, for us, that means a bottle of wine. Our wine segment is sponsored by Dry Farm Wines which is a fabulous online company that will ship you organic, biodynamic, naturally yeasted, low-sugar, no-garbage wines from all around the world. This is wine that is grown and bottled to help you tap into life and celebrate it!

American Blossom Linens  - COUPON CODE: HOMEMAKERCHIC20   We LOVE our modern vintage sheets made from Texas-grown cotton… no dyes, no imported fabrics here -  Turn your bedroom into an organic, chic oasis by using the promo code HOMEMAKERCHIC20, and get an exclusive 20% off discount just for listening to the show.

item.itunes:title: Talking About Chin Hairs... Again
item.title: Talking About Chin Hairs... Again
item.description:
I guess we can't help ourselves.   Chin hairs?  Faux eyelashes?   Covid and beauty routines?  Why bother?   
Here we are again.   Ang confesses to wearing a LOT of mascara (with no apparent shame) and Shaye recalls weaning herself off bleach blond hair.
Should we care about our looks?   Why can't we just give other women a break?   Turns out, our toilette, like so much else, turns out to be a matter of the heart.

Patreon Love: A massive thank you to our Patrons over on Patreon www.patreon.com/homemakerchicpodcast. Patreon is a way that you can show your love for our podcast by contributing $5 or $10/month and in return, we’re going to show OUR love with a digital copy of each of our cookbooks, along with a LIVE ZOOM call with us each month and some extra conversation, bonuses episodes and more. We appreciate all of our patrons and we'll see you in a couple of weeks for our private live stream!!
WIN FREE SHEETS FROM American Blossom Linens!
Visit our Instagram feed @homemakerchicpodcast and find the post with the sheets.   Follow directions and be entered to WIN a free set of the sheets Angela and Shaye adore! 
Don't want to wait to win?  Visit www.americanblossomlinens.com and use the coupon code HOMEMAKERCHIC20 for 20 percent off your own lifetime quality bedding.

Cue the WINE MUSIC!   https://bit.ly/ ryFarmWinewithHomemakerChicOffer your guests a glass of Dry Farms bubbly this Holiday Season!

You can get either 3,6 or 12 bottles delivered to your door monthly.
Drink Dry Farm Wines with Ang and Shaye!   Shop and Sip at:  https://bit.ly/ ryFarmWinewithHomemakerChic

OUR AMAZON LINK
https://amzn.to/3fdxEgu
Shop Amazon for ANYTHING with this link at no extra cost to you!

Your one-stop-online shop for organic, all natural skincare and makeup. Instead of going to Target or Sephora and filling your basket with face creams, cleansers, and makeup that causes hormone disruption, skin irritation, and much more - check out Toups and Co. item.itunes:title: Advocate for YOUR Creativity
item.title: Advocate for YOUR Creativity
item.description:
Homemakers-   No one's going to do it for you.  It's got to be you.   
Are you looking to skill up?   Learn something new?  Pick up with those piano lessons you gave up after high school?   Polish off those old tap shoes?  In an effort to rescue the art of homemaking from the daily grind we need to take care of our minds, hands, and all our amazing capabilities.   We're dissecting these ideas today as best we can, sharing our trial and errors and everything in between.

Angela's opinion on being an amatuer:  https://youtu.be/GGbVj8SOCgM
Listen to the cello after listening to the podcast:  https://www.gautiercapucon.com/bio.php?lg=EN
Amélie's IG feed: @doorcountycartoonist

Cue the WINE MUSIC!   https://bit.ly/ ryFarmWinewithHomemakerChicOffer your guests a glass of Dry Farms bubbly this Holiday Season!
Today’s “What We’re Sipping” segment is brought to you by Dry Farm Wines. Dry Farms is an online wine subscription that pairs organic, biodynamic, naturally yeasted, low-sugar, lower-alcohol wines from all over the world. As Dry Farm customers, we get to share in their love for organic, naturally and traditionally made wines.  “better, not more.” So check out their better wines. You can get either 3,6 or 12 bottles delivered to your door monthly.
Drink Dry Farm Wines with Ang and Shaye!   Shop and Sip at:  https://bit.ly/ ryFarmWinewithHomemakerChic

Today’s episode is brought to you by: OUR AMAZON LINK
https://amzn.to/3fdxEgu
Shop Amazon for ANYTHING with this link at no extra cost to you!

WIN A SET OF AMERICAN BLOSSOM SHEETS!
Visit www.americanblossomlinens.com and use the code HOMEMAKER20 and hop over to Instagram, comment on the photo of linens, tag a friend and you're automatically entered into a drawing taking place on 12/12 for a Queen size set of our FAV, American Blossom Linens.  Home-grown, modern vintage, made here in America.   Invest once and never buy sheets again!
Enter over on Instagram @homemakerchicpodcast

Angela's opinion on being an amatuer:  https://youtu.be/GGbVj8SOCgM
Listen to the cello after listening to the podcast:  https://www.gautiercapucon.com/bio.php?lg=EN

item.title: Mid-Holiday Monday Chit Chat
item.description:
Wooosh - Thanksgiving is over and we're looking forward to December.   How do we juggle normal, everyday homemaking with the added fun of the Holidays?   How do you make time for the extra activities?  What if you don't even LIKE the extra activities?   Ang is under the weather and Shaye is under the gun with farm chores.  It's time for a catch-up chat while we hash it all out.

CUE THE WINE MUSIC! Today’s “What We’re Sipping” segment is brought to you by Dry Farm Wines. Dry Farms is an online wine subscription that pairs organic, biodynamic, naturally yeasted, low-sugar, lower-alcohol wines from all over the world. As Dry Farm customers, we get to share in their love for organic, naturally and traditionally made wines.  “better, not more.” So check out their better wines. You can get either 3,6 or 12 bottles delivered to your door monthly.
Drink Dry Farm Wines with Ang and Shaye!   Shop and Sip at:  https://bit.ly/ ryFarmWinewithHomemakerChic

Today’s episode is brought to you by:
OUR AMAZON LINK
https://amzn.to/3fdxEgu
Shop Amazon for ANYTHING with this link at no extra cost to you!

American Blossom Linens  - COUPON CODE: HOMEMAKERCHIC20   We LOVE our modern vintage sheets made from Texas-grown cotton… no dyes, no imported fabrics here -  Turn your bedroom into an organic, chic oasis by using the promo code HOMEMAKERCHIC20, and get an exclusive 20% off discount just for listening to the show.

Jovial Foods. Jovial Foods is a company that supplies us, homemakers, with the most gorgeous baking flours and foods. Jovial is most well known for their einkorn flour, which is a high-protein, weak gluten flour that bakes up buttery and rich.  This is a company that has an extreme love for high-quality ingredients which is why we welcome them into our pantries and into our kitchens. Visit them at jovialfoods.com and enjoy their free shipping! Coupon Code: HOMEMAKER

item.itunes:title: More with "Madame Chic"
item.title: More with "Madame Chic"
item.description:
We just had to grab Jennifer of the Daily Connoisseur and visit with her again.   Let's face it, we're all sort of struggling as it feels like we're constantly going against the grain.  She shares with us, in a world that's rather chaotic, how manners and class can give us a source of comfort. 

Find Jennifer here:  https://jenniferlscott.com/
Any enjoy her Youtube channel here: https://www.youtube.com/user/TheDailyConnoisseur
GRAB JENNIFER'S BOOKS HERE:
https://bit.ly/3madamechicbook
https://bit.ly/conoisseurkidsbook

You can get either 3,6 or 12 bottles delivered to your door monthly.
Drink Dry Farm Wines with Ang and Shaye!   Shop and Sip at:  https://bit.ly/ ryFarmWinewithHomemakerChic

item.itunes:title: Where We Play Catch Up
item.title: Where We Play Catch Up
item.description:
Good grief - We've hardly spoken to each other all week it's time to get CAUGHT up with each other and with YOU!

You NEED Dry Farms on hand for entertaining!  CUE the wine music!
Get your "penny bottle" now by visiting https://www.dryfarmwines.com/homemakerchic
This is the part of the podcast where we encourage you to pour a glass of whatever scratches your itch, for us, that means a bottle of wine. Our wine segment is sponsored by Dry Farm Wines which is a fabulous online company that will ship you organic, biodynamic, naturally yeasted, low-sugar, no-garbage wines from all around the world. This is wine that is grown and bottled to help you tap into life and celebrate it!   Today's wine is a bubbly and we think you NEED some!   Try Dry Farm Wines along with the thousands of Homemaker Chic listeners who love it and let us know what YOU think!

American Blossom Linens  - COUPON CODE: HOMEMAKERCHIC20   We LOVE our modern vintage sheets made from Texas-grown cotton… no dyes, no imported fabrics here -  Turn your bedroom into an organic, chic oasis by using the promo code HOMEMAKERCHIC20, and get an exclusive 20% off discount just for listening to the show.
