Give your palette what it's craving with Dry Farm Wines.  What are YOU sipping today?  Drink Dry Farm Wines with Ang and Shaye!   Shop and Sip at:  https://bit.ly/DryFarmWinewithHomemakerChic 

Dry Farm Wines curates only the highest quality natural wines from small, sustainable family farms that meet our strict standard of health. Unlike today's commercialized and processed wines, this is real wine. Nothing added, nothing removed.   We LOVE that now SO many of you of sipping what WE'RE sipping!

Pure, artisanal, and deliciously clean.

  • Sugar-Free (< 1g/L)
  •  Lower Sulfites (< 75ppm)
  •  Lower Alcohol (< 12.5%)
  •  Mycotoxin/Mold-Free
  •  No Industrial Additives

Our LOVE comment for the week is from @The_oglesby_ohana: “NEEDED THIS. As I was so confident going into this year's gardening season only to feel like I’m failing. NEVERTHELESS, I shall gird my loins and march forward with fortitude and grit. I will be a fabulous gardener one day. And these failings will teach me! Knowing that you ladies have failed gives me confidence - hahahaha. Sadly and oddly. HA!”

Patreon Love: A massive thank you to our Patrons over on Patreon www.patreon.com/homemakerchicpodcast. Patreon is a way that you can show your love for our podcast by contributing $5 or $10/month and in return, we’re going to show OUR love with a digital copy of each of our cookbooks, along with a LIVE ZOOM call with us each month and some extra conversation, bonuses episodes and more. We appreciate all of our patrons and we'll see you in a couple of weeks for our private live stream!!

Sleep Chic with our FAVORITE linens company!  Get your modern vintage sheets at americanblossomlinens.com with the 20% off promo code HOMEMAKERCHIC20.
Sleep fabulous this spring in your new “modern vintage” sheets.   Woven to last and feel fabulous. This is the same weave used in most luxury hotel bedding and the quality heirloom sheets your grandparents used!   Bed by bed we're going through our homes and changing ALL our linens over to American Blossom Linens.   We know you'll sleep fabulous and chic, just like we are:).  Fast fashion doesn't just apply to clothing!  Don't send your bedding to the landfills!   American Blossom linens are woven to last a lifetime!

Jovial Foods. www.jovialfoods.com
Jovial Foods is an amazing company, run by husband and wife team Carla and Rodolfo. After they discovered years ago that their daughter had a gluten sensitivity, they struck out to find grains that her body could easily digest and thrive off eating - and that led them to einkorn. Einkorn is an ancient variety of wheat - the oldest we know of - that our bodies flourish off of because of its high protein and extremely weak gluten.  You must try this flour! It’ll change your baking life!
item.itunes:author: Angela Reed & Shaye Elliott

item.itunes:title: That was a FAIL!
item.title: That was a FAIL!
item.description:
Shaye's birthday present will be late and Angela can't make chocolate chip cookies and she doesn't want any outside intervention.   She's owning it.  Shaye can leave a trail of death and destruction in her barnyard.... today is all about our EPIC fails.   And to tell the truth, sometimes it's been really tough to pull ourselves up and try again.   

"A man learns nothing from winning.  The act of losing, however, can elicit great wisdom.  Not least of which is, how much more enjoyable it is to win.  It’s inevitable to lose now and again.   The trick is not to make a habit of it." - Uncle Henry from the movie A Good Year

Quarantine survival: Shaye's kids are playing with Perler Beads
Angela's binging on Trey Kennedy videos! 

We're sipping our Dry Farm Wines!
Dry Farm Wines curates only the highest quality natural wines from small, sustainable family farms that meet our strict standard of health. Unlike today's commercialized and processed wines, this is real wine. Nothing added, nothing removed.   We LOVE that now SO many of you of sipping what WE'RE sipping!

Pure, artisanal, and deliciously clean.

  • Sugar-Free (< 1g/L)
  •  Lower Sulfites (< 75ppm)
  •  Lower Alcohol (< 12.5%)
  •  Mycotoxin/Mold-Free
  •  No Industrial Additives

Don't forget!  Show you chic love with a five-star rating and a review!   

Clearly we're attracting some like-minded gap pals.... this girl cracking us up over on Instagram @homemakerchicpodcast
@tanja1036b says:  SO I was struggling to find time to listen to the podcast without interruption until today.  My husband and I telework right now and we are should to shoulder at our desks.   Every single noise he made, chewing his food, breathing, talking out loud, you get the picture. To save our marriage I plugged in my headphones and started your podcast and now I am blissfully working with your friendly voices are in my ear..."

item.itunes:author: Angela Reed & Shaye Elliott

item.itunes:title: All the feminine feels.
item.title: All the feminine feels.
item.description:
"Crazy.   We're crazy for feeling so lonely?"  Cue the Patsy Cline.
What are we craving and WHY?   "Stuck" at home and channeling women of bygone era's?   Someone send petticoats and flapper fringe because we have no idea what we're doing here, all we know is that we want to feel feminine.   We want ALL the sexy, warm fuzzies and turns out, we want to dress the part.   From Angela's repentance from "fast fashion" to Shaye's recent craving of 1700's garb.   Scarlett, Claire, Velma, Tasha...It's Freestyle Blursday and if you've ever wanted to wear a hoopskirt, apparently, we've got your BACK and all that jazz!
(Hoopskirts would really help with social distancing anyways.   Maybe we'll start a trend!)

Scarlett had to cover her booze from Rhett with "rosewater" - you won't have to do that when you drink wine with class from Dry Farm Wines.  What are YOU sipping today?  Drink Dry Farm Wines with Ang and Shaye!   Shop and Sip at:  https://bit.ly/DryFarmWinewithHomemakerChic  

Dry Farm Wines curates only the highest quality natural wines from small, sustainable family farms that meet our strict standard of health. Unlike today's commercialized and processed wines, this is real wine. Nothing added, nothing removed.   We LOVE that now SO many of you of sipping what WE'RE sipping!

Pure, artisanal, and deliciously clean.

  • Sugar-Free (< 1g/L)
  •  Lower Sulfites (< 75ppm)
  •  Lower Alcohol (< 12.5%)
  •  Mycotoxin/Mold-Free
  •  No Industrial Additives

Don't forget!  Show you chic love with a five-star rating and a review!   

Clearly we're attracting some like-minded gap pals.... this girl is FEELING our vibe over on Instagram @homemakerchicpodcast
@Thewoodsidestories: “Today I am cooking supper in full makeup, with a 1920s flapper costume under my pinny as we are starting a murder mystery directly after eating. I feel I may be taking things a little too far. How much is too much?”

item.itunes:author: Angela Reed & Shaye Elliott

item.itunes:title: We're ALL Homemakers
item.title: We're ALL Homemakers
item.description:
A heartfelt conversation about what a "homemaker" is, WHO is a homemaker, and what's the point and purpose of it anyway? Can the microwave meal be part of homemaking?  Can the full-time career woman be a homemaker?   (Our answers may surprise you).  Shaye shares some inspirational quotes about the art of homemaking and Angela says homemaking is a state of mind for the single woman in her flat to the mom of fifteen children.   We're ALL homemakers.   Even our one male listener: "Frank".   Welcome, Frank to Homemaker Chic!

Don't forget!  Show you chic love with a five-star rating and a review!   

Our love comment of the week was the BEST and shows that @Jess.raber "gets" the self-deprecating aspect of the show!
 “While listening to this week’s episode, I was sipping a wonderful La Croix, key lime flavor, canned in 2020, while wearing scrubs and no lipstick, driving home from an evening shift in the behavioral health ER. (So much would have been sipping a glass of wine, but alas, drinking and driving is frowned upon by everyone, including me. And I’m with you Shaye! Sun Gold tomatoes ROCK.”

Patreon Love: A massive thank you to our Patrons over on Patreon www.patreon.com/homemakerchicpodcast. Patreon is a way that you can show your love for our podcast by contributing $5 or $10/month and in return, we’re going to show OUR love with a digital copy of each of our cookbooks, along with a LIVE ZOOM call with us each month and some extra conversation, bonuses episodes and more. We appreciate all of our patrons and we'll see you in a couple of weeks for our private live stream!!

What are YOU sipping today?  Drink Dry Farm Wines with Ang and Shaye!   Shop and Sip at:  https://bit.ly/DryFarmWinewithHomemakerChic  Shaye's perfecting her "aggressive German" and sipping another German wine and Ang is partaking of the brut bubbly this week as we savor our Dry Farm Wines.   

Dry Farm Wines curates only the highest quality natural wines from small, sustainable family farms that meet our strict standard of health. Unlike today's commercialized and processed wines, this is real wine. Nothing added, nothing removed.   We LOVE that now SO many of you of sipping what WE'RE sipping!

Pure, artisanal, and deliciously clean.

  • Sugar-Free (< 1g/L)
  •  Lower Sulfites (< 75ppm)
  •  Lower Alcohol (< 12.5%)
  •  Mycotoxin/Mold-Free
  •  No Industrial Additives

Sleep Chic with our FAVORITE linens company!  Get your modern vintage sheets at americanblossomlinens.com with the 20% off promo code HOMEMAKERCHIC20

Sleep fabulous this spring in your new “modern vintage” sheets.   Woven to last and feel fabulous. This is the same weave used in most luxury hotel bedding and the quality heirloom sheets your grandparents used!   Bed by bed we're going through our homes and changing ALL our linens over to American Blossom Linens.   We know you'll sleep fabulous and chic, just like we are:)

We're wearing RED WINE by Toups and Co.   What are YOU wearing?
"Soup with a T, plural":)    Toups and Co. Toups and Co. is an organic, sustainable, all-natural makeup company owned by our friends Emilie and Trent.  And speaking of red lipstick (you must try the RED WINE color!). Head on over to Toups and Co. (that’s t-o-u-p-s) and use coupon code HOMEMAKER to get a 10% discount just for being a Homemaker Chic listener.

item.itunes:author: Angela Reed & Shaye Elliott

item.itunes:title: Freestyle "Blursday" Meets Dirt Dishing
item.title: Freestyle "Blursday" Meets Dirt Dishing
item.description:
EPISODE 17.  Freestyle "Blursday" Meets Dirt Dishing
We're sipping Dry Farm Wine sparkling white and sharing what's taking place in our gardens.   One of us lives in a desert, the other by the Great Lakes so there's plenty of notes to compare.   We're foraging for spring delicacies,  starting dahlia tubers, ordering new trees, AND turning down the NOISE so we can enjoy the gardens even more.   Come get your fingernails dirty with us again!

Our LOVE comment this week is from:

Fraennie on Instagram: “Hi from Germany! I just wanted to tell you girls that I love your podcast. I’m listening to the newest right now and this really makes my day. Like now I am drinking my coffee and getting ready for the day. Putting on some red lipstick, just because I can want to! And I just feel so inspired and like I found my people. None of my friends or family is so much into gardening or farming like me. You just inspired me to make my dream of my own farm one really come true and get it done and do some small steps now! I don’t know what to say but THANK YOU so much for the peek into your life and thoughts, I really enjoy it.”

Our Fab Advertisers!

What are YOU sipping today?  Drink Dry Farm Wines with Ang and Shaye!   Shop and Sip at:  https://bit.ly/DryFarmWinewithHomemakerChic 

Dry Farm Wines curates only the highest quality natural wines from small, sustainable family farms that meet our strict standard of health. Unlike today's commercialized and processed wines, this is real wine. Nothing added, nothing removed.   We LOVE that now SO many of you of sipping what WE'RE sipping!

Pure, artisanal, and deliciously clean.

  • Sugar-Free (< 1g/L)
  •  Lower Sulfites (< 75ppm)
  •  Lower Alcohol (< 12.5%)
  •  Mycotoxin/Mold-Free
  •  No Industrial Additives

Sleep Chic!  Get your modern vintage sheets at americanblossomlinens.com with the 20% off promo code HOMEMAKERCHIC20

Sleep fabulous this spring in your new “modern vintage” sheets.   Woven to last and feel fabulous. A percale weave which is a traditional one-yarn-over and one-yarn-under results in a very structurally sound, long-wearing fabric that is resistant to pilling. It has a crisp, yet soft, feel and allows more air to pass through it, providing a 'cool' sleep on warm nights and a 'warm' sleep on cool nights. This is the same weave used in most luxury hotel bedding and the quality heirloom sheets your grandparents used

We're wearing RED WINE by Toups and Co.   
"Soup with a T, plural":)    Toups and Co. Toups and Co. is an organic, sustainable, all-natural makeup company owned by our friends Emilie and Trent.  Organic skin care and a variety of clean, non-toxic makeup products like mineral foundation, beautiful blushes, concealers, mascara, and even red lipstick (you must try the RED WINE color!). Head on over to Toups and Co. (that’s t-o-u-p-s) and use coupon code HOMEMAKER to get a 10% discount just for being a Homemaker Chic listener. We love Toups and Co.’s natural skincare and makeup and trust that you will too! Tell Emilie we sent you! 

Patreon Love: A massive thank you to our Patrons over on Patreon www.patreon.com/homemakerchicpodcast. Patreon is a way that you can show your love for our podcast by contributing $5 or $10/month and in return, we’re going to show OUR love with a digital copy of each of our cookbooks, along with a LIVE ZOOM call with us each month and some extra conversation, bonuses episodes and more. We appreciate all of our patrons!

Patreon is a way that you can show your love for our podcast by contributing $5 or $10/month and in return, we’re going to show OUR love with a digital copy of each of our cookbooks, along with a LIVE ZOOM call with us each month and some extra conversation, bonuses episodes and more. We appreciate all of our patrons!
item.itunes:author: Angela Reed & Shaye Elliott

item.itunes:title: Sun in the Sky: Fresh and Springy
item.title: Sun in the Sky: Fresh and Springy
item.description:
Fresh for spring: We can’t walk upright, out hands are trashed and apparently, so are our houses.  What is “garden house” and why is it NOT a good thing?   Our favorite jams to rock out to whilst we clean and why we think you need to crawl around on your hands and knees.  How we’re attempting to keep our homes inspired and tidy during the insane Spring planting season.  Sun in the sky... you know how WE feel!

MUSIC WE TALKED ABOUT:
Melody Gardot:
https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B0027J4SKA?ie=UTF8&tag=homemakerchic-20&camp=1789&linkCode=xm2&creativeASIN=B0027J4SKA
Nina Simone:
https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B004RF4FP0?ie=UTF8&tag=homemakerchic-20&camp=1789&linkCode=xm2&creativeASIN=B004RF4FP0
Lauren Hill ROCKS Nina's Feeling Good:
https://soundcloud.com/daniel420/lauryn-hill-feeling-good-live
Our LOVE comment this week is from:
“thevicarswifesfrugallife” on Instagram: “I just discovered your podcast and binged three epsiodes. I LOVE it. I work full time outside the home, but have a passion for homemaking and it’s so refreshing to heat people talk about it in a fun, non saccharine way. We live in London but have recently turned our back garden into a potager of paradise. I hope you and your families are safe and well! xx.”
Books:
Champagne Baby by Laure Dugas:  https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/1101884630?ie=UTF8&tag=homemakerchic-20&camp=1789&linkCode=xm2&creativeASIN=1101884630
Stuff:
Fresh Kitchen Dish Towels:
https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00H1HYZ9C?ie=UTF8&tag=homemakerchic-20&camp=1789&linkCode=xm2&creativeASIN=B00H1HYZ9C
Beeswax Candles:
https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00SPECG0K?ie=UTF8&tag=homemakerchic-20&camp=1789&linkCode=xm2&creativeASIN=B00SPECG0K
Ang's favorite mop:  https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B06XP53FCC?ie=UTF8&tag=homemakerchic-20&camp=1789&linkCode=xm2&creativeASIN=B06XP53FCC

Our Fab Advertisers!  What are YOU sipping today?  Drink Dry Farm Wines with Ang and Shaye!   Shop and Sip at https://bit.ly/DryFarmWinewithHomemakerChic  Dry Farm Wines curates only the highest quality natural wines from small, sustainable family farms that meet our strict standard of health.  Nothing added, nothing removed.  

Sleep Chic!  Get your modern vintage sheets at americanblossomlinens.com with the 20% off promo code HOMEMAKERCHIC20. Sleep fabulous this spring in your new “modern vintage” sheets.   Woven to last and feel fabulous.  This is the same weave used in most luxury hotel bedding and the quality heirloom sheets your grandparents used.

item.itunes:title: We're Going OFF!
item.title: We're Going OFF!
item.description:
Well, it all just came pouring out.   We’re sorry/not sorry.    We’ve hit our boiling point and it’s all just overflowing.   Wasted food, homesteader guilt,  and Shaye rages over approval to take a walk with your child?   In this episode we’re channeling our inner revolutionaries, eating our leather loafers and Ang explains why she never watched the Bachelor.

Become a PATRON of the the podcast at: Patreon.com/Homemakerchicpodcast. 

SHOWNOTES...Books, discount links and more:

Our Loooooooovely Advertisers!

What are YOU sipping today?  Drink Dry Farm Wines with Ang and Shaye!   Shop and Sip at:  https://bit.ly/DryFarmWinewithHomemakerChic

Dry Farm Wines curates only the highest quality natural wines from small, sustainable family farms that meet our strict standard of health. Unlike today's commercialized and processed wines, this is real wine. Nothing added, nothing removed.

Pure, artisanal, and deliciously clean.

  • Sugar-Free (< 1g/L)
  •  Lower Sulfites (< 75ppm)
  •  Lower Alcohol (< 12.5%)
  •  Mycotoxin/Mold-Free
  •  No Industrial Additives
  •  Dry-Farmed (No Irrigation)
  •  Minimal Intervention
  •  Wild Native Yeast
  •  Small Productions
  •  Paleo-Friendly
  •  Keto-Friendly
  •  Low Carb-Friendly
  •  Mouthwateringly Delicious
  •  Older Vines (generally 35-100 years)
  •  Naturally or Biodynamically Farmed

Sleep Chic!  Get your modern vintage sheets at americanblossomlinens.com with the 20% off promo code HOMEMAKERCHIC20
A percale weave which is a traditional one-yarn-over and one-yarn-under results in a very structurally sound, long wearing fabric that is resistant to pilling. It has a crisp, yet soft, feel and allows more air to pass through it, providing a 'cool' sleep on warm nights and a 'warm' sleep on cool nights. This is the same weave used in most luxury hotel bedding and the quality heirloom sheets your grandparents used.

Tuck into a delicious loaf of bread: Order your Jovial Einkorn Flour at jovialfoods.com
In 2008, Carla and Rodolfo teamed up with an organic farmer just a few minutes from their home in Northern Italy, to grow the first 50 acres of einkorn wheat. Einkorn was new to them and farmer Stefano, and they were both worried and delighted to see how differently it grew. Einkorn yields a fifth of modern wheat and reaches above 5 feet tall by the harvest in late July. 

A decade has passed and the same farmers are still growing einkorn for Carla and Rodolfo. All of our farms are located in remote, pristine areas, and have ample land to adhere to a five-year rotation plan with forage and legumes. One of the most beautiful and largest farms where our einkorn always grows is located in Tuscany, outside of Siena. 

Pucker up baby! Grab your red lips and organic skincare here:  toupsandco.com and use the promo code HOMEMAKER for 10% off!

Books we mentioned:
CORK DORK: https://amzn.to/3bRLCUk

Products we mentioned:
Angela's Favorite Loafers: https://amzn.to/2Wa6K1v

item.title: Freestyle Thursday: A Slight Accent on Accents
item.description:
Another where the wind takes us chat - this time it took us to deciphering British accents. While Angela would pop a pill to have one, Shaye’s comes out Australian. Get ready to get silly.

What are YOU sipping today?  Drink Dry Farm Wines with Ang and Shaye!   Shop and Sip at:  https://bit.ly/DryFarmWinewithHomemakerChic

Einkorn was new to them and farmer Stefano, and they were both worried and delighted to see how differently it grew. Einkorn yields a fifth of modern wheat and reaches above 5 feet tall by the harvest in late July. 

A decade has passed and the same farmers are still growing einkorn for Carla and Rodolfo. All of our farms are located in remote, pristine areas, and have ample land to adhere to a five-year rotation plan with forage and legumes. One of the most beautiful and largest farms where our einkorn always grows is located in Tuscany, outside of Siena. 

Pucker up baby! Grab your red lips and organic skincare here:  toupsandco.com and use the promo code HOMEMAKER for 10% off!

item.itunes:title: Freestyle Thursday: Body hair, messy bedrooms, and tattoos.
item.title: Freestyle Thursday: Body hair, messy bedrooms, and tattoos.
item.description:
Another Thursday where we've waited to talk until the podcast recording, so we've got plenty to chat about.   Today we cover all necessary bases - body hair, messy bedrooms, and tattoos included.

Become a PATRON of the the podcast at: Patreon.com/Homemakerchicpodcast.

What are YOU sipping today?  Drink Dry Farm Wines with Ang and Shaye!   Shop and Sip at:  https://bit.ly/DryFarmWinewithHomemakerChic

Dry Farm Wines curates only the highest quality natural wines from small, sustainable family farms that meet our strict standard of health. Unlike today's commercialized and processed wines, this is real wine. Nothing added, nothing removed.

Pure, artisanal, and deliciously clean.

  • Sugar-Free (< 1g/L)
  •  Lower Sulfites (< 75ppm)
  •  Lower Alcohol (< 12.5%)
  •  Mycotoxin/Mold-Free
  •  No Industrial Additives
  •  Dry-Farmed (No Irrigation)
  •  Minimal Intervention
  •  Wild Native Yeast
  •  Small Productions
  •  Paleo-Friendly
  •  Keto-Friendly
  •  Low Carb-Friendly
  •  Mouthwateringly Delicious
  •  Older Vines (generally 35-100 years)
  •  Naturally or Biodynamically Farmed

Sleep Chic!  Get your modern vintage sheets at americanblossomlinens.com with the 20% off promo code HOMEMAKERCHIC20
A percale weave which is a traditional one-yarn-over and one-yarn-under results in a very structurally sound, long wearing fabric that is resistant to pilling. It has a crisp, yet soft, feel and allows more air to pass through it, providing a 'cool' sleep on warm nights and a 'warm' sleep on cool nights. This is the same weave used in most luxury hotel bedding and the quality heirloom sheets your grandparents used.

Tuck into a delicious loaf of bread: Order your Jovial Einkorn Flour at jovialfoods.com
In 2008, Carla and Rodolfo teamed up with an organic farmer just a few minutes from their home in Northern Italy, to grow the first 50 acres of einkorn wheat. Einkorn was new to them and farmer Stefano, and they were both worried and delighted to see how differently it grew. Einkorn yields a fifth of modern wheat and reaches above 5 feet tall by the harvest in late July. 

A decade has passed and the same farmers are still growing einkorn for Carla and Rodolfo. All of our farms are located in remote, pristine areas, and have ample land to adhere to a five-year rotation plan with forage and legumes. One of the most beautiful and largest farms where our einkorn always grows is located in Tuscany, outside of Siena. 

Pucker up baby! Grab your red lips and organic skincare here:  toupsandco.com and use the promo code HOMEMAKER for 10% off!
